minimumResponses

public int minimumResponses()
Description copied from interface: ChallengeSet
Computes the minimum number of responses that would satisfy this policy. Generally, this would be ChallengeSet.getMinRandomRequired() + ChallengeSet.getRequiredChallenges().size();

Specified by:
minimumResponses in interface ChallengeSet
Returns:
minimum number of responses that would satisfy this policy.

isLocked

public boolean isLocked()
Description copied from interface: ChallengeSet
Check to see if any of the underlying challenges are not locked. If any challenge is not locked, then the entire ChallengeSet is considered to be not locked.

Specified by:
isLocked in interface ChallengeSet
Returns:
true if all contained Challenges are locked.
